name: randomizer-pokedex
description: A place for people to see the Pokedex for the Randomizer I am playing

scripts.buildDev: webpack --mode development --config webpack.dev.config.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.server.config.js
scripts.buildProd: webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.config.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js

author: Alexander Lyons
